title: Memorial day laptop sales 2021: today's best deals on Dell, HP, Apple, and more
author: alex-whitelock
summary: Here are our top picks for today's Memorial Day laptop sales
article: We've now officially arrived at the big day itself, and, as expected this year's Memorial Day laptop sales definitely don't disappoint if you're looking for a great price on a new machine.

Lenovo, HP, Dell, and even Apple are some of the retailers and brands we've found excellent discounts on in today's Memorial Day laptop sales and you can see today's best deals just below. We've included discount amounts where applicable, and even a top pick for you to consider if you'd like to check out our personal recommendation.

Everything's separated into price brackets although we've also included a couple of Memorial Day gaming laptop sales for good measure. Our top pick so far? We absolutely love this $700 discount on a new Dell XPS 13 for just $799.99 - a rare deal on the latest model, and a machine that's packing in a stunning 4K display too. If that's a little too expensive for your tastes then we've got your back - just below our top pick you'll find options as low as $179 for a very cheap (and cheerful) Lenovo Chromebook, a machine that's great for the basics.

For all our gaming brothers and sisters, we've also added some top picks for today's Memorial Day gaming laptop sales. You'll find options as low as just $599 for a great 15.6-inch Evoo at Walmart, and even a few of Dell's latest machines on sale with discounts ranging up to $270.

Of course, that's just a small selection of this week's early Memorial Day laptop sales and you'll find a full list just down below. If you'd like to see what other top tech is on sale, then head on over to our main Memorial Day sales 2021 page.

We hope you've found a fantastic laptop deal today but if not check out our main laptop deals page, where there are over 15 cheap laptops on offer right now.
